text: local land use planning and regulatory powers lot sizes amend rsa i b to read as follows b lot sizes the percentage of a lot that may be occupied and the size of yards courts and other open spaces provided that no ordinance shall require more than a square foot lot size for single family housing lots where such lots are serviced by a municipal or community water and sewer infrastructure and the lot or lots do not exceed the existing municipal or community water and sewer infrastructure capacity and that nothing in this subparagraph shall be construed to limit the use of rsa i k to designate areas in the community with smaller lot size requirements for housing
